conclusion: The question asks for the acceleration of the particle from 1 to 3 seconds using the v-t graph.
The v-t graph shows a line segment from (1, 2) to (3, 0).
The slope of the velocity-time graph during the interval from 1 to 3 seconds is negative.
The slope is calculated as (0 - 2) m/s / (3 - 1) s = -1 m/s^2.
The acceleration of the particle during the time interval from 1 to 3 seconds is -1 m/s^2.
